pkgmetadata.longdescription: Robust Online Bayesian Monitoring // An implementation of Bayesian online changepoint detection (Adams and MacKay (2007) arXiv:0710.3742) with an option for probability based outlier detection and removal (Wendelberger et. al. (2021) arXiv:2112.12899). Building on the independent multivariate constant mean model implemented in the 'R' package 'ocp', this package models multivariate data as multivariate normal about a linear trend, defined by user input covariates, with an unstructured error covariance. Changepoints are identified based on a probability threshold for windows of points.
